notes: [Added] Updated for Top Shelf Craft transition
[Added] Added icons for Craft 2.5 CP views
[Added] Added documentation and release feed urls for the 2.5 CP
[Fixed] Fixed a small issue with the javascript when running in a hidden tab that didn't have viewport focus.
[Added] onBeforeSave event to help custom usages
[Fixed] A display bug where the map wouldn't always be reinitialised in a resized matrix block
[Fixed] Some small visual glitches in the CP views
[Added] A direct map method with a full set of control and interaction settings to set exactly how the front-end rendered map looks and behaves
[Fixed] A bug that would throw an invalid template path when rendering the automatic map on the front-end on some Craft installs
[Fixed] A bug that would stop the field settings view from working on some Craft installs not in devMode
